ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Tailoring
ygData.msgSnippet: Su, You offer good advice, but I have to add a warning about the Frontier Mountains zone. You mentioned having Camouflage memmed, which, while a good idea
ygData.messageBody:
Su,

You offer good advice, but I have to add a warning about the Frontier
Mountains zone. You mentioned having Camouflage memmed, which, while a good
idea while travelling in any dangerous zone, can lull you into a false sense
of security in FM (Dreadlands too). I say that because the Mountain Giants
are not fooled by Camo, or Invis -- they see right through it, and would not
be a good chance meeting for a level 29 druid travelling alone. I think some
of the Goblin Casters and perhaps the Burynai Cenobites can also see through
Camo/Invis.

Froondor, Wood Elf Druid of 41 seasons
Tarew Marr
